title: Egg Custard

ingredients.content: 2 egg yolks, from large eggs, at room temperature

preparations.content: <b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>. Avoiding whisk and blade, place all ingredients in mixing bowl and cook <b>4 min/90°C/speed 2<b>.
<b>Remove butterfly whisk<b>. Transfer custard to a bowl and allow to cool before serving.

hintsAndTricks: To make a fruity egg custard, blend 50 g ripe fruit <b>10 sec/speed 5<b> in mixing bowl before step 1.
